summary: The module defines a benchmark that trains a GraphSAGE model in an unsupervised manner using negative sampling, measuring execution time and throughput. It includes a custom loss, a negative sample generator, the model architecture, and utilities for data handling and timing.
business_intent: Provide a reproducible performance test for GraphSAGE unsupervised training on graph data, enabling developers and researchers to assess and compare computational efficiency across hardware or software configurations.
